categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Talagian was a Gran male and Jedi Master of the Jedi Order. He was stationed on Voss during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Talagian appears only in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic under the mission "Our Past Ourselves" as the content wasn't released with the game.
